arts.ttl: Jim Goodwin insists Dundee Utd denied 'perfectly good goal' and VAR cost them more than points in Hibs defeat
arts.sum: Sam Dalby's effort would have put United 2-1 up but Goodwin can;t see the handball it was ruled out for

arts.ttl: Hibernian score two late goals to win at Dundee United and move up to fourth
Jamie McGrath's lucrative Hibs deal laid bare as Aberdeen swap nets him seven figure package
arts.sum: Aberdeen were only willing to offer a three-year deal with the Hibees landing him with that extra 12 months on the table

arts.ttl: Ferguson, Cameron and Dundee Utd v Hibs in spotlight
arts.sum: New Rangers head coach Barry Ferguson, Dundee midfielder Lyall Cameron and Dundee United against Hibernian are under focus in the midweek Scottish Premiership card.

arts.ttl: Ian Gordon writes off £7.2m Hibs losses as emotional owner tells shareholders 'we live and breathe this club'
arts.sum: The American insists his family, including mother Kit and brother Colin, had no hesitation in covering that loss.

arts.ttl: Gordon family will donate £7.2m to clear Hibs loss
arts.sum: Hibernian executive director Ian Gordon says his family will absorb the club's £7.2m losses this year.

arts.ttl: What Aberdeen wouldn’t agree on to keep Hibernian-bound Ireland midfielder at Pittodrie
arts.sum: Aberdeen have confirmed that Ireland midfielder Jamie McGrath will leave the club at the end of the season and will join rivals Hibernian. “Jamie McGrath will leave Aberdeen at the end of the season following the expiry of his contract,” it read.

arts.ttl: Hibs seal pre-contract deal with Dons' McGrath
arts.sum: Hibernian announce "stand-out" midfielder Jamie McGrath will join the club at the end of this season when his Aberdeen contract expires.

arts.ttl: Hibs seal pre-contract deal with Dons midfielder McGrath
arts.sum: Hibernian announce "stand-out" midfielder Jamie McGrath will join the club at the end of this season when his Aberdeen contract expires.

arts.ttl: Jamie McGrath agrees Hibs pre contract as midfielder heads for Aberdeen transfer exit
arts.sum: The midfielder will bring the curtain down on his time at Pittodrie following the end of the current campaign
